title: Fossil Watch
description: A classic Fossil watch featuring a brown leather strap with a refined, traditional look. The dial includes three subdials for added functionality and a touch of sophistication.

title: Molniya Watch
description: This Molniya timepiece boasts a black leather strap and a clean white dial. It features two subdials and a date window at the bottom center, offering a blend of style and utility.

title: Triwa Falken Watch
description: The Triwa Falken watch is water-resistant up to 5 ATM. It comes with a sleek silver dial, a small seconds subdial at the bottom, and a black leather strap with textured crosshatch details.

title: LimeStone Quartz Watch
description: Featuring a striking blue dial, the LimeStone Quartz watch displays the day of the week and the date on the right side. Its unique design shows yesterday, today, and tomorrowâ€™s dates for added convenience.

title: SoldTimerRus Watch
description: With a sporty design, this watch from SoldTimerRus features a black dial and a perforated rubber strap. The dial prominently displays 'Tag HEUER FORMULA1 CALIBRE5' at the bottom.

title: ORKINA Watch
description: The ORKINA watch has a white dial encased in a gold-plated bezel secured by steel screws. The date window is on the right side, magnified for easy reading. It also features a stitched leather strap.

title: FREDERIQUE CONSTANT GENEVE Watch
description: A timeless piece from FREDERIQUE CONSTANT GENEVE, this watch has a clean white dial and a slim, black leather strap stitched with matching threads. A perfect example of understated elegance.

title: Smart Watch
description: This smartwatch offers a range of features including heart rate monitoring, step counting, time, and date display. It comes with a leather strap and a digital display for easy readability.

title: Seiko Chronograph 100M Watch
description: The Seiko Chronograph 100M watch features a black dial with gold accents. It includes three subdials for minutes, seconds, and an alarm function. The bold design is complemented by a sturdy build.

title: Steel Digital Watch
description: A sleek, unbranded steel watch with a digital dial. The dial features white digital hands and a red second hand, along with a day and date display at the bottom. It comes with a steel bracelet strap.
